content: I don’t think it’s the wage gap as much as a contentment gap. No one wants to feel like they’re putting an unfair amount of effort into a relationship. Someone who loves their job/life is probably happy to be earning more or less than their partner. Someone who is unhappy with their job/life will likely be resentful if they feel trapped there by anything — including financial obligations to a partner or family. And paradoxically, it’s probably alleviated somewhat if the ‘suffering’ is equitable.
